MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G13 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7.30pm due to a fault on the underground cable network in Crow road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:54PM on Thursday 14 January 2021.
